## Block.getInputWithBlock() method

Return the input that connects to the specified block.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getInputWithBlock(block: Block): Input | null;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  block | [Block](./blockly.block.md) | A block connected to an input on this block. |

**Returns:**

[Input](./blockly.input.md) \| null

The input (if any) that connects to the specified block.
